critique: The document expresses concern and determination regarding the situation in Haiti. It aims to address the threat to national security and support the Haitian people while taking action against the de facto regime. The emotions conveyed are primarily concern and resolve, with a hint of disgust towards the illegitimate regime. There is minimal joy or surprise. Fear is present due to the threat to national security, and sadness is present due to the disruption of the democratically elected government.
